sentence.Network_en: The salesman is still persisting with his demands.
sentence.Network_cn: 那店员仍在坚持他的要求.

sentence.Network_en: UN member countries delivered a strong rebuke to both countries for persisting with nuclear testing programs.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合国成员国对两国继续进行核试验项目提出强烈谴责。

sentence.Network_en: How many wars have been averted by patience and persisting good will!
sentence.Network_cn: 忍耐和坚持善意曾避免了多少战争啊!

PerfectNetExp.abs: persister 耐药株, persisting 迁, persisting 存留

you may have to let go of some bad habits and develope some more positive ones , but do not give up -- for it is only in trying and persisting that dreams come true .你可能要改掉一些坏习惯，培养出一些好习惯，但不要放弃--因为这只是努力实现和坚持你的梦想。准备好面对改变，相信改变源于你的内在力量。

* 的持续性（PERSISTENCE），对象通过写出描述自己状态的数值来记录自己，这个过程叫对象 * 的串行化Serializable。

entry.def: If something undesirable persists, it continues to exist.

example.ex: Contact your doctor if the cough persists...
example.tran: 如果还是咳嗽就去看医生。

example.ex: These problems persisted for much of the decade.
example.tran: 这些问题在那10年的大部分时间里一直存在。

entry.def: If you persist in doing something, you continue to do it, even though it is difficult or other people are against it.

example.ex: Why does Britain persist in running down its defence forces?...
example.tran: 为什么英国要坚持消减其军事防御力量？

example.ex: He urged the United States to persist with its efforts to bring about peace...
example.tran: 他敦促美国继续进行和平斡旋。

means.word_mean: 1. relentless and indefatigable in pursuit or as if in pursuit;

auth_sentence.content: With the easterlies persisting through much of next week too, the cold could well hang on until the bitter end of March.
auth_sentence.res_content: With the easterlies persisting through much of next week too, the cold could well hang on until the bitter end of March.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With the easterlies persisting through much of next week too, the cold could well hang on until the bitter end of March.

auth_sentence.content: The figures also show that all women increased their chances of getting pregnant by persisting with fertility treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The figures also show that all women increased their chances of getting pregnant by persisting with fertility treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The figures also show that all women increased their chances of getting pregnant by persisting with fertility treatment.

auth_sentence.content: Now with sluggish growth persisting, the economy will be hit by a huge fiscal tightening right at the time it does not need it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now with sluggish growth persisting, the economy will be hit by a huge fiscal tightening right at the time it does not need it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now with sluggish growth persisting, the economy will be hit by a huge fiscal tightening right at the time it does not need it.
